Test Description: Verify user can login with correct email and password
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Sign In page
2. Enter email `admin@ncc.com`
3. Enter password `nccadmin`
4. Click "Sign In"
Expected Result: User is redirected to the Dashboard. User's name is visible in the header.

Test Description: Verify system rejects invalid login attempts
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Sign In page
2. Enter email `admin@ncc.com`
3. Enter an incorrect password
4. Click "Sign In"
Expected Result: Error message ""Invalid email or password"" is displayed. User remains on Sign In page.

Test Description: Verify system rejects non-existent user login
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Sign In page
2. Enter email `nouser@example.com`
3. Enter any password
4. Click "Sign In"
Expected Result: Error message ""Invalid email or password"" is displayed. User remains on Sign In page.

Test Steps:
1. Click on user avatar in header
2. Select "Log out"
Expected Result: User is redirected to the Sign In page.

Test Steps: 1. Attempt to navigate directly to `/dashboard` or `/candidates`
Expected Result: User is redirected to the Sign In page.

Test Description: Verify user can change their password
Test Steps: `admin@ncc.com`) is logged in
Expected Result:
1. Click user avatar > "Change Password"
2. Enter correct current password
3. Enter new valid password
4. Confirm new password
5. Submit
6. Log out and log back in with new password
Priority: Password changed successfully. User can log in with new password. Success toast.

Test Steps:
1. Click user avatar > "Change Password"
2. Enter incorrect current password
3. Enter new password
4. Submit
Expected Result: Error message ""Incorrect current password."" is displayed.

Test Steps:
1. Click user avatar > "Change Password"
2. Enter current password
3. Enter new password "newPass1"
4. Enter confirm password "newPass2"
5. Submit
Expected Result: Error message ""New passwords do not match"" is displayed.

Current: nccadmin
New: newPass1
Confirm: newPass2
